introText: My name is Gerard and I am {{age}} years old. I live in Terrassa (Barcelona), and I work as a Flutter applications developer. I am a lover of sports and music; and of the latter, make it sound with the guitar.
introText2: This web page has been developed from scratch with this technology.
introtext3: Below you can download my Curriculum Vitae in different languages, or browse the different tabs above to obtain more detailed information about my professional career.
